name: The Amazing Race
overview: Race around the world and experience the thrill of the hit reality series with The Amazing Race video game! Grab your clue, choose your transportation, and make your way to the pit stop! Just like in the TV show you’ll overcome Detours, Road Blocks, Fast Forwards, Intersections and more as you make your way through exotic locations all across the globe! And don’t forget to watch out for unexpected obstacles that could slow you down. Meet Phil Keoghan at every pit stop as he reads your clues, introduces challenges and gives you prizes. Will you beat your competition in the race to the mat or experience what it feels like to hear him say "I'm sorry, your team is the last to arrive"? Find out as you experience all the excitement the show has to offer wrapped up in hours of fun!
